name: Morphology.CustomPronoun
desc: A custom pronoun behavior for use in a specific langauge.

items.name: static func isSupported(forLanguage: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the given language supports setting custom pronouns.

items.name: static func requiredKeys(forLanguage: String) -> [PartialKeyPath<Morphology.CustomPronoun>]
items.desc: Returns a collection of the custom pronoun keys required by this language.

items.name: var subjectForm: String?
items.desc: The subject pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.

items.name: var objectForm: String?
items.desc: The object pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.

items.name: var possessiveForm: String?
items.desc: The posessive pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.

items.name: var possessiveAdjectiveForm: String?
items.desc: The posessive adjective pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.

items.name: var reflexiveForm: String?
items.desc: The reflexive pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.

items.name: init(from: Decoder)
items.desc: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes this value into the given encoder.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: static func == (Morphology.CustomPronoun, Morphology.CustomPronoun) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are equal.

items.name: static func != (Morphology.CustomPronoun, Morphology.CustomPronoun) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are not equal.
